General.Name: Megawin Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Megawin Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs and sells ICs primarily in Taiwan. The company provides 8051 MCU and Cortex-M0 products; and USB products, including full speed MCUs, USB keyboards/mouses/joysticks, USB bridges, and charge ICs. It also offers firmware tool kits, such as ICE, writers, and ISP programmers. Megawin Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Jhubei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 8, Taiyuan 1st Street, Jhubei City, Taiwan, 30288
